tasks.label: Clean Build Workspace
tasks.detail: Clean build the entire ROS 2 workspace

tasks.label: Hardware: Bringup Rover (Full)
args: source /opt/ros/humble/setup.bash && source install/setup.bash && ros2 launch rover_bringup hardware_bringup.launch.py > eval.log 2>&1
tasks.detail: Launch hardware drivers for Vstone base and Livox LiDAR

tasks.label: Hardware: Vstone Only
args: source /opt/ros/humble/setup.bash && source install/setup.bash && ros2 launch rover_bringup vstone_base.launch.py
tasks.detail: Launch only Vstone base hardware (no LiDAR)

tasks.label: Teleop: Keyboard Control
args: source /opt/ros/humble/setup.bash && source install/setup.bash && ros2 run teleop_twist_keyboard teleop_twist_keyboard --ros-args -r cmd_vel:=rover_twist
tasks.detail: Control rover with keyboard (requires hardware bringup)

tasks.label: RViz: Fwdsrover Configuration
tasks.command: DISPLAY=:1 XAUTHORITY=$HOME/.Xauthority xterm -hold -e "source /opt/ros/humble/setup.bash && source install/setup.bash && rviz2 -d src/fwdsrover_xna_ros2/fwdsrover_xna_bringup/rviz/fwdsrover_xna.rviz > eval.log 2>&1" &

tasks.label: RViz: Robot State Display
tasks.command: DISPLAY=:1 XAUTHORITY=$HOME/.Xauthority xterm -hold -e "source /opt/ros/humble/setup.bash && source install/setup.bash && ros2 launch rover_bringup robot_state_display.launch.py > eval.log 2>&1" &
tasks.detail: Launch RViz with robot state visualization and URDF model

tasks.label: Navigation: SLAM Mapping
args: source /opt/ros/humble/setup.bash && source install/setup.bash && ros2 launch rover_navigation rover_navigation.launch.py use_slam:=true
tasks.detail: Launch navigation with SLAM for mapping new environments

tasks.label: Navigation: Map-based Navigation
args: source /opt/ros/humble/setup.bash && source install/setup.bash && ros2 launch rover_navigation rover_navigation.launch.py use_slam:=false map:=${input:mapPath}
tasks.detail: Launch navigation with existing map file
